alert.note: Alert for Newport; Providence (Rhode Island) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 06 at 4:20PM EDT until June 06 at 5:15PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: The National Weather Service in Boston/Norton has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Plymouth County in southeastern Massachusetts... Central Bristol County in southeastern Massachusetts... Northeastern Newport County in Rhode Island... East central Providence County in Rhode Island... * Until 515 PM EDT. * At 420 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Attleboro, or near Pawtucket, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. * Locations impacted include... Fall River, Pawtucket, Taunton, East Providence, Dartmouth, Cumberland, North Attleborough, Attleboro, Lincoln, Central Falls, Somerset, Swansea, Tiverton, Westport, Seekonk, Rehoboth, Lakeville, Freetown, Dighton and Berkley. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
